column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: サンドブーツ？
column4: Sand boots?

column3: さようなら
column4: Good-bye.

column3: 見つけたよ
column4: Found it.

column3: 砂漠なのによく走れるね
column4: Nice sand-jogging!

column3: サンドブーツ欲しい
column4: Gimme those boots.

column3: 知ってる
column4: I've heard it.

column3: やめときます
column4: Never mind.

column3: これ見て！
column4: Look at this!

column3: 探してきます
column4: I'll go look.

column3: 八人目の英雄？
column4: Eighth heroine?

column3: サンドブーツください
column4: Sand boots, please!

column3: サンドブーツの事
column4: Sand boots?

column3: 八人目の英雄の事
column4: The eighth heroine?

column3: スノーブーツちょうだい
column4: Snow boots, please.

column3: さようなら
column4: Good-bye.

column3: ホッ ハッ ホッ ハッ
column4: *huff...huff...huff*

column3:
なんだ男かよ…

サンドブーツを履けばゲルド女子にモテるって
聞いたから ずっと走ってアピールしてるのに…
誰一人声をかけてくれないんだよ…
ガセネタだったのかなぁ…
column4:
Oh, it's just a guy...
Saw me running around, huh?

See, I heard Gerudo women liked a guy
in sand boots, so I've been jogging all
over for forever trying to show off...
But none of them will talk to me!
I'm starting to wonder if that rumor was
just a bunch of bunk...

column3:
ゲルド地方に伝わる
『七人の英雄伝説』…
だけど…本当は…
八人目の英雄が存在したらしいんだ…
彼女がなぜ歴史から葬られてしまったのか…
それは誰もわからないんだけど
噂はあれど誰も見た事がない幻の英雄…
子供の頃からの憧れだったんだ
だからその八人目の英雄を見せてもらえたら
このサンドブーツをキミに譲ってあげてもいいよ
column4:
Everyone's heard the legend in the
Gerudo region about the seven heroines,
but...some tell of an eighth heroine...
Wiped clean from history, and no one
knows why or how...

A phantom heroine known to all but
seen by none... I've been taken with the
legend since I was a child.
Find her! Show me the eighth heroine,
and I'll give you these sand boots. 
What do you say?

column3:
八人目の英雄の事は色んな人が調べてるけど
まだ謎が解けていない都市伝説だ
謎を調べている間に仲良くなって…
そして…
ふふっ
column4:
Many have investigated the eighth heroine, but it's
an inscrutable legend, an unsolved and possibly
unsolvable puzzle...
And as Ms. Boots spins her wheels on it, we'll grow
closer... And closer... And then... 

Hee hee!

column3:
よかった！
無事だったんだね！
なかなか帰ってこないし
心配していたんだ…
実は八人目の英雄なんて単なる都市伝説で
実在しないものなんだ…
僕…
キミとお近づきになりたくて
無理なことを言って
キミを引き留めておきたかっただけなんだけど…
結果的にキミを危ない目に遭わせることに
なったんじゃないかって不安で不安で…
でも もうキミを危ない目には遭わせないよ！
これからは僕がキミを守…
column4:
Oh! Oh, thank goodness!
You made it back safely!

You were gone for so long, I started to 
fear the worst...

I have to come clean. The eighth heroine
is just an urban legend—it doesn't
actually exist...
I... Well, I just wanted an excuse to get
close to you, y'know?

I wanted to keep you engaged so I just
thought up something impossible to hold
your interest...
And as a result, I put you in harm's way!
I'm a cad! And I've been so, so worried...

I won't put you in danger anymore!
From now on, I'll be your protect—

column3:
僕を心配させまいと
慰めてくれてるのかい？
キミは優しいんだね

でも そんな気遣いは無用さ
これからは僕がキミを…
column4:
Are you trying to console me because
I've been so heartsick over this?

You're such a kind soul.


But no need to coddle me.
From now on I'll—

column3:
ぼ僕はボテンサ
35歳独身趣味はジョギング！
皆からは良くも悪くもがんばり屋さんだね！
って言われます
き キミは一人なのかな？
良かったら僕と一緒に…
column4:
So yeah, hey, the name's Bozai.
I'm 35, single, and I LOVE jogging.
Especially on sand.
Yeah, everyone says I'm tenacious as a
tick! And I think some of them meant it in
a nice way, too!
S-so...you out here on your own?
Pretty rough and tumble place...
Wanna hang out with me awhile?

column3:
サンドブーツは砂の上でも普通に歩ける
砂漠の民にとって憧れの一品！
でも もう作り手がいなくなっちゃって
今一番入手困難な超レアなブーツなんだ！
どうだい？ うらやましいだろ！
column4:
Sand boots let you walk normally on
sand, so if you live in the desert, 
believe me, you want a pair!
BUT! The only person capable of making
them passed away, which means they're
impossibly rare and extremely valuable!
What do you think? Jealous, right?

column3:
あっ…サンドブーツに気づいちゃった？

これさえあれば砂漠の砂に足をとられず
普通に歩けるようになるからね
ジョギングだって楽々さ！

だから良かったら一緒に…
column4:
Ah... You noticed these old things?
Yeah, they're my sand boots.

They allow me to traverse the desert
without being slowed down at all, 
so jogging is a breeze.
If you'd like to check them out,
we could grab a quiet corner and...

column3:
しかしまあサンドブーツもないのに
よくこの砂漠を歩き回ってられるもんだね
僕には考えられないよ
column4:
Sure seems like you do a lot of running
around in the desert for someone who
doesn't even have sand boots.
I would never think of doing that.
Don't you get tired?

column3:
えっ…？
ああ…
さ… さよなら
column4:
Huh? Aw...


Good... Good-bye.

column3:
えっ？僕の話聞いてた？
このサンドブーツは超レアものなんだ
女の子ならともかく
男のお前なんかに譲るわけないだろ
僕は忙しいんだ
あっちいけよ！
column4:
Huh? You're coveting these things
after you heard me sing their praises?
Not cool.
Look, these sand boots are super rare.
Mayyyybe I'd consider giving them to
you if you were a girl, but a guy? NO.
I'm busy here. Get lost!

column3:
す…

すごいじゃないか！

今まで都市伝説と思われていた
あの八人目の英雄が本当にいたなんて！
これが世間に知れたら
すごい騒ぎになるよ！！
…でもさ 
僕は誰にも言わないよ…
そうすれば これはキミと僕
2人だけの秘密ってことだよね！
よ よかったら
これを機に僕と…
column4:
That—


THAT'S AMAZING!


I thought it was just an old wives' tale!
The eighth heroine actually exists?!

If the rest of the world knew this, it'd be 
absolute bedlam!

...But I won't tell anyone...


Yeah, that way, it'll just be our little
secret, right? Sort of a bonding thing.

And yeah, i-if it's OK, I'd like to take this
opportunity to ask you—

column3:
やった！

八人目の英雄は彼女を慕う者達によって
今でもゲルド高地に祀られてるって噂があるのと
赤褐色の巨神って異名を持つこと以外のことは
よくわかってないんだ…
『七人の英雄伝説』の事なら詳しい人が
ゲルドの街にいるって聞いた事はあるけど…
ともかく絵でも何でもいいんだ
見つけたら教えてくれるかい？
ただし絵ならせめて
上半身がわかるもので頼んだよ
column4:
YESSSSSS!


*ahem!* According to those who idolize
the eighth heroine, she is enshrined
somewhere in the Gerudo Highlands.
Apparently they even have a nickname
for her: The Bronze Giant. Catchy.
Beyond that, I don't really know much...
Who knows, there might be someone in
Gerudo Town who knows more about
the legend of the seven heroines.
Maybe that info would help. I don't know.
Anyway, draw a picture or something if
you find her! And then show me!
I'm pretty picky about pictures, too.
If you get one, make sure at least the
statue's upper half is visible, OK?

column3:
ゲルド地方に伝わる
『七人の英雄伝説』…
だけど…本当は…
八人目の英雄が存在したらしいんだ…
彼女を慕う者達によって
今でもゲルド高地に祀られてるって噂があるのと
赤褐色の巨神って異名を持つこと以外のことは
よくわかってないんだ…
『七人の英雄伝説』の事なら詳しい人が
ゲルドの街にいるって聞いたことはあるけど…
ともかく絵でもなんでもいいんだ
見つけたら教えてくれるかな？
ただし絵ならせめて
上半身がわかるもので頼んだよ
column4:
There's a legend in the Gerudo region
about the seven heroines, but...
some also tell of an eighth heroine...
They whisper that she's worshiped by
the people who hang out in the
Gerudo Highlands.
Apparently they have a name for her:
The Bronze Giant. But that's about the
limit of what I've heard.
If it helps, there might be someone in
Gerudo Town who knows more about
the legend of the seven heroines.
Anyway, it'd be great if you could draw a
picture or something if you find her...
Then come show me.
If you do get a picture, make sure at 
least the statue's upper half is visible!

column3:
またキミか…悪いけど 
僕は女の子にしか興味ないんだ
それにサンドブーツのアピールで
走り回って疲れてるんだ
用があるなら
さっさと済ませてくれるかな？
column4:
You again... Sorry, but in case you didn't
catch my drift earlier, I'm only interested
in talking to women. Gerudo women.
I'm almost too tired to woo, though.
Running around trying to show off these
sand boots is exhausting!
So whatever your deal is, just say it and
be on your way!

column3:
サンドブーツは砂の上でも普通に歩ける
砂漠の民にとって憧れの一品！
でも もう作り手がいなくなっちゃって
今一番入手困難な超レアなブーツなんだ！
どうだい？ うらやましいだろ！
column4:
Sand boots let you walk normally on
sand, so if you live in the desert, 
believe me, you want a pair!
BUT! The only person capable of making
them passed away, which means they're
impossibly rare and extremely valuable!
What do you think? Jealous, right?

column3:
ちょ調子はどうだい？

よ よかったらサンドブーツや
八人目の英雄について
ゆっくり語り合わないかい？
column4:
H-how are you doing?


I-if you like, we can take some time to
talk about these sand boots and the
eighth heroine.

column3:
よ よかったら もっとゆっくり
サンドブーツや八人目の英雄について
語り合わないかい？
column4:
If y-you want, we could spend a little 
more quality time talking sand boots and
eighth heroines...

column3: そそうだったね…
column4: Oh... Oh, OK...

column3:
よし装着完了！

ただ これだと砂漠では走りづらいし
走りっぱなしで実はかなり疲れててね
ゲルドの街の入口に テントみたいなのあったし
しばらく そこで体を休めとくよ
よかったら キミも一緒に…
column4:
All right, we're done here!


Boy, but these will make running in the
sand pretty difficult, and I'm pretty tired
anyway from my jogging regimen...
I think I'll just park myself under the tent
in front of Gerudo Town and take five.
Care to join me later?

column3:
えっ？

いや… これは…
このサンドブーツは超レアもので…
譲ってあげたいのは山々なんだけど…

……

…でもこれは仲良くなれるチャンスかも

そうだね…譲ってあげてもいいよ
でも その代りにお願いがあるんだ！
キミは八人目の英雄の噂を知ってるかい？
column4:
Huh?


Oh... Well... Here's the thing.
These sand boots are super rare, and
I'd happily give them to you, but...
...


...Wait. This is a golden chance to woo...


I mean, sure! I'd LOVE to give them to
you, you hungry little boot monster!
But first, a favor. 
Ever heard the legend of the
eighth heroine?

column3: サササ サヴォッタ！
column4: Sa-sa-sa...sav'otta!

column3: サササ サヴァサーヴァ！
column4: Sa-sa-sa...sav'saaba!

column3: サササ サヴァーク！
column4: Sa-sa-sa...sav'aaq!

column3:
ままま また会ったね
偶然も運命って言うから
もしかしたら僕たちは…
column4:
S-s-s-so we meet again... At a certain
point, coincidence MUST be called
destiny. We two are intertwined...

column3:
サンドブーツは砂の上でも普通に歩ける
砂漠の民にとって憧れの一品！
でも もう作り手がいなくなっちゃって
今一番入手困難な超レアなブーツなんだ！
column4:
Sand boots let you walk normally on
sand, so if you live in the desert, 
believe me, you want a pair!
BUT! The only person capable of making
them passed away, which means they're
impossibly rare and extremely valuable!

column3:
ややや やぁ
こんなに僕に何度も話しかけてくれるなんて…
もしかしたら キミも僕のこと…
column4:
H-h-hey. You keep coming by to chat
with ol' Bozai, huh? Methinks the lady
has been captivated, perhaps?

column3:
ゲルド高地みたいな雪深い場所だと
雪に足をとられて歩きづらいだろ？
でもこのスノーブーツがあれば
雪深い所でもいつも通り…
いや…"いつも以上に早く歩けるんだ！

これも もう作り手がいなくて
貴重な物だから あげることはできないけど…
column4:
The Gerudo Highlands are covered in
deep snow, so it's hard to walk, right?
Everyone knows that.
But with these snow boots, you can walk
through snow like it was flat ground...

No... You can walk even faster than that!


No one makes these anymore, so they're
extremely valuable. As such, you can't
keep them, OK?

column3:
あと これ… よかったら使ってよ
きっと君の役に立つと思うんだ
column4:
Oh, and here... If you'd like, you can use
these. I'm sure they'll come in handy.
Besides, you seem really into boots.

column3:
あとさゲルド高地みたいな雪深い場所だと
雪に足をとられて歩きづらいだろ？
だから雪でも快適に歩ける僕のスノーブーツを
貸してあげようと思ったんだけど…
荷物がいっぱいみたいだから
荷物に空きが出来たらまたおいでよ
ゲルド高地に行くなら
絶対スノーブーツはあった方がいいからさ
column4:
OK, so the Gerudo Highlands are covered
in deep snows, so it's hard to walk,
am I right?
I wanted to lend you my snow boots,
which make the whole snow-trudging
thing much more pleasant, but...
It looks like your bag is full. How many
boots do you have in there?! Adorable.
Make some room and come back, OK?
If you're going to the Gerudo Highlands,
you're definitely gonna want these
snow boots. Trust me.

column3:
も もしかして
僕に会いに来てくれたのかな？
よ よかったらお茶でも…
column4:
D-did you come to see me?
Wh-why don't we grab a cup of tea or 
something...

column3:
そっ… そうだよね
お茶なんかしてる暇ないよね…
これがスノーブーツだよ
column4:
Y-yeah...right... Of course you don't
have time for tea or anything like that...

These are the snow boots.

column3:
これも貴重なブーツだから
貸してあげることしかできないけど…
そそれよりさ
まだ時間あるなら
よ よかったらサンドブーツや
八人目の英雄について
ゆっくり語り合わないかい？
column4:
These are also valuable boots, so I can
only lend them to you...

A-anyway, if you still have some time...


W-would you like to stay here and chat
with me for a while about the sand boots
or the eighth heroine?

column3:
でも キミ…
まだ荷物が いっぱいみたいじゃないか
欲張りな女の子も嫌いじゃないけど
荷物がそんなんじゃ貸せないよ…
そそれよりさ
もし時間あるなら
よ よかったらサンドブーツや
八人目の英雄について
ゆっくり語り合わないかい？
column4:
But it looks like your bag is still full...


I LOVE how insatiable you are for boots,
but if your bag is full, then I can't lend
you anything...
A-anyway, if you still have some time...


W-would you like to stay here and chat
with me for a while about the sand boots
or the eighth heroine?

column3:
じゃあ話は早いね

噂はあれど誰も見た事がない幻の英雄…
子供の頃からの憧れだったんだ
だからその八人目の英雄を見せてもらえたら
このサンドブーツをキミに譲ってあげてもいいよ
column4:
Aren't you clever? In that case,
this won't take much explanation.

We've all heard the legend, but the
phantom heroine that none have seen...
has been my dream since I was a child.
If you were to somehow show me the
eighth heroine, I could make you a gift
of these sand boots.

column3:
ややや やあ
また話しかけてくれるなんて！
キミもヒマしてるのかな？
良かったら僕と一緒に…
column4:
H-h-hey! After the way we left it, I didn't
think you were into, y'know, chatting.
Are you bored?
If you are, ol' Bozai has the cure for
THAT malady! Want to hang out?

column3:
…っと
キミ荷物がいっぱいじゃないか…
欲張りな女の子も嫌いじゃないけど
それじゃあ渡せないよ…
荷物整理ができたら
また声かけてよ！
僕は キミが見つけやすいように
いつでもここを走ってるからさ！
き…決まった～！！
column4:
...Wait. Your bag is full, isn't it?
Probably full of boots, am I right?

Adorable. Look, I'm all for girls who love
stuff, but I can't give you these if you
have nowhere to stash them.
Come talk to me again when you've
organized your bag, OK?

I'll just jog around here until we meet
once again!

Y-YESSS! Advantage, Bozai!

column3:
まさか都市伝説とばかり思っていた
八人目の英雄を拝めるなんて
思ってもみなかったよ…

でも これってキミと僕しか知らない
2人だけの秘密ってことだよね！
よ よかったら
これを機に僕と…
column4:
To think that I could pay my respects to
the eighth heroine, who I thought was no
more than an urban legend...
Who would've thought it was possible?


Oh, but it's our little secret!


And since we're both in a secretive
mood, what say we secret ourselves in
a quiet spot and get to know—

column3:
僕だと思って大切にしてね

じゃあスノーブーツ返してもらっていいかな？
このままじゃ僕裸足になっちゃうし
column4:
Treat them as tenderly as you would me.


*ahem* And now, could you be a lamb
and return my snow boots? Otherwise ol'
Bozai's going to be barefoot!

column3:
ちょっと待ってね
すぐ脱ぐから…
column4: Just a second. I'll take them off...
